text:
Stranger at the Door

Raskolnikov, startled in his room, eyes wide.  
A stranger stands, grinning eerily.  
Stranger: "Arkady Ivanovich Svidrigaïlov, allow me to introduce myself..."  

---  

Raskolnikov, heart racing, feels trapped.  
Raskolnikov: "Who are you?"  
Svidrigaïlov: "Just a friend... or perhaps more."

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov encounters a mysterious stranger named Arkady Ivano-vitch Svidrigaïlov.
